text: Jilani: “Ana nkwaona akwawanganya ŵenu (ni Allah) aŵala ŵankwalumbanjila kunneka Allah? Munosyani, ana ni upandechi wetaka waagumbile? Kapena akwete ŵanganyao liunjili lyakamusyangana (najo Allah) ku mawunde?” Kapena twapele ŵanganyao (achimakafilio) chitabu, basi ŵanganyao ni ali ni umboni wakuonechela kuumila mu chalakwecho (wakwakundisya ukafili waowo)? (Ngwamba), nambo ŵalupuso ngakulanganaga ŵane ni ŵane ikaŵeje ya chinyengo
